testimonials.name: Robert Martinez
testimonials.text: Primer Technologies handled everything perfectly! From listing our property to coordinating the move, their team was professional and efficient. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Jennifer Lee
testimonials.text: The maintenance team saved us from a major plumbing disaster. Quick response, fair pricing, and excellent work. We've signed up for their regular maintenance plan.

testimonials.name: David Wilson
testimonials.text: Outstanding handyman service! Fixed multiple issues in our new home quickly and professionally. Will definitely use Primer for all future property needs.

testimonials.name: Amanda Chen
testimonials.text: The moving team was incredible. Careful with our belongings, efficient, and friendly. Made our relocation stress-free. Thank you Primer Technologies!

testimonials.name: Thomas O'Brien
testimonials.text: Professional property listing service that got us 15% above asking price. The photography and marketing were top-notch. Excellent value for money.

testimonials.name: Samantha Park
testimonials.text: 24/7 support is a game-changer. Had an emergency on a weekend and the team was there within an hour. Peace of mind is priceless.
